title: (x) Help with this font, please / unconnected handwriting - (similar to/modified) Present {Mike Y}
author: talktojen77

comments.content:
I think it looks like [Present](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209213008/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/present/roman/characters.html), with a modified G (the 'beard' has been added).

- Mike Yanega
